channel.title: The KEWL Lounge's podcast
channel.description: Welcome to the KEWL Lounge's podcast. A podcast where the cool people listen to house music. A relaxing audio atmosphere where one can enjoy a smooth beat while going about the business of the day. Mixes from our very on Dr. KEWL are featured here. http://www.kewllounge.net
channel.itunes:subtitle: KEWL Music 4 KEWL People!!
channel.itunes:author: Doctor KEWL
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to the KEWL Lounge's podcast. A podcast where the cool people listen to house music. A relaxing audio atmosphere where one can enjoy a smooth beat while going about the business of the day. Mixes from our very on Dr. KEWL are featured here. http://www.kewllounge.net

item.title: KEWL Quickie # 10
item.description: House Music Connoissuers, I know It's been a while. But I have returned with the tenth installment of a KEWL Quickie to slide between your ears and move your body. A little taste of ten tunes that will tickle your ears and touch your soul. Just enough to make you want more. So, are you ready for a quickie? Hopefully the music will slide a vibe into your groove and hold you over until you can get to a dancefloor! KEWL Quickie # 10 Ear Kandi: Oliver:Granulated Soul (Respect To Detroit Mix) N'Dinga Gaba and DJ Spen feat.. Marc Evans:Until You (MuthaFunkaz Vocal Remix) Margaret Grace:My Love is Not Blind (Extended Vocal) Luyo & DJ Ermi:My King (DJ Spen & Gary Hudgins Remix) The Str8jackets feat. Tyree Cooper:Givin' You More (Alfred Azzetto & Christian Hornbostel Remix) DJ Minx feat Eva Solas:Suffer (Pirahnaheads Rerub) Watanabe:Let's Work (Original) Stephanie Cooke:Sunshine (Cookie Monsterz Remix) Stephanie Cooke and Diviniti:I Believe In You (Main Vocal) Roland Clark & The Wizard (Brian Coxx):The Deeper I Go (Original Mix) Thanks for your support and be sure to pass this mix to your KEWL friends! Listen to the KEWL Lounge 24/7 from the comfort of your mobile phone: Get Tunein in you App store The KEWL Lounge's live Stream: http://rock.neostreams.info:12618 Brand Nu!! The four KEWLest pieces of Ear Kandi playing in the KEWL Lounge. http://drkewls4play.blogspot.com Follow Dr. KEWL on Twitter : http://twitter.com/DrKEWL On Facebook? The KEWL Lounge is on Facebook! Join the us! Knowledge Expands the Way we Live Be KEWL!!!

item.title: The KEWL Lounge's KEWLest Tunes of 2011
item.description: Fresh out of Get Reel Studios, Dr. KEWL slides the year's best tunes between your ears! Uplifting, Soulful, & KEWL music made our bodies move all year long. With so many kewl tunes coming out in 2011 it was hard for him to decide which would make the top ten. So here now, from #10 to #1, is the ear kandi played in the KEWL lounge in 2011. The Ear Kandi: #10 Black Coffee Featuring Hugh Masekela - We Are One (Black Coffee Original Demo Mix) # 9 Barbara Tucker pres. Charlotte Small - Rain (muthafunkaz remix) # 8 Aphrodisiax feat. Tiger S - Killing Time (Kings Of Soul Vocal mix) # 7 Asymmetric Soul feat. Meital De Razon - Running Around (Lonya Remix) # 6 Leroyal - Promise (To Love You Forever) (Muthafunkaz Vocal) # 5 Monique Bingham - You. Me. World (Jon Cutler's Distant Music Mix) # 4 Liquideep - Angel (DJ Spen & Gary Hudge Long Version) # 3 Guy Robin feat. Lucy Randell - Only You (Vox Mix) # 2 Dawn Tallman - I am Free (Original Mix) # 1 Donae'o - I (Kenny Dope Remix) For more information on the top ten check out the Forum in the KEWL Lounge. Thanks for your support and be sure to pass this mix to your KEWL friends! The gift that keeps on giving! Listen to the KEWL Lounge 24/7 from the comfort of your mobile phone: KEWL live Stream: http://rock.neostreams.info:12618 Check out the four KEWLest pieces of Ear Kandi playing in the KEWL Lounge this month. http://drkewls4play.blogspot.com Follow Dr. KEWL on Twitter : http://twitter.com/DrKEWL The KEWL Lounge is on Facebook! Like us! Knowledge Expands the Way we Live Happy New Year & Be KEWL!!!

item.title: KEWL Quickie # 9
item.description: House Music Connoissuers, are you ready for a quickie? Well here is the ninth installment in the series. This quickie features tunes that I found interesting during the last three months. Hopefully the music will slide a vibe into your groove and hold you over until you can get to a dancefloor! KEWL Quickie # 9 Ear Kandi: Aphrodisiax & Afronaut feat. Sabrina chyld: Slip Away (club mix) Peter James Kahn & the Glovz: Shine (Richard Earnshaw main mix) Nastee Nev feat. Donald Sheffey: I'm so hung up on you (main vocal mix) Lulo Cafe feat. Nothende:I wanna love you (the Layabouts future retro vocal mix) Liquideep:Angel (dj Spen & Gary Hudge long version) Phil Asher & A.C. Layne feat. Baby Sol:We Can Make It Happen (Main) UPZ aka Avi Elman: Moment with you (Kiko Navarro rmx) Zakes Bantwini: Wasting my time (Black Coffee original mix) Shake The Dog feat. Monique Bingham: do it (QB's hot mix) Thanks for your support and be sure to pass this mix to your KEWl friends! Listen to the KEWL Lounge 24/7 from the comfort of your mobile phone: KEWL live Stream http://rock.neostreams.info:12618 Brand Nu!! The four KEWLest pieces of Ear Kandi playing in the KEWL Lounge. http://drkewls4play.blogspot.com Follow Dr. KEWL on Twitter : http://twitter.com/DrKEWL On Facebook? The KEWL Lounge is on Facebook! Join the us! Knowledge Expands the Way we Live Be KEWL!!!

item.title: That KEWL Lounge Vibe
item.description: As the Summer ends and Fall approaches The KEWL Lounge reaches its 4th anniversary! Four years of bringing you Kewl tunes. We would like to thank each and everyone of you who have supported us.Here is a KEWL mix of music heard in the KEWL Lounge. Blended by Dr. KEWL. Positive, uplifting and soulful house music, just what the doctor ordered for your mind, body, and soul to keep pushing on. So lets tip it up and never give up, because we understand House music. Knowledge Expands the way We Live! Ear Kandi: Steal Vybe feat. Alexis Simmons: Is It Possible(Rocco Soul Vocal Mix) DJN Project feat. Drea D'nur: Musiq (Soulmagic Remix) Capital T feat. Taymah: Perfect Love (Groove Assassin Masterclass Mix) Steven Stone feat. Marc Evans: Never Give Up (Montana & Stewart Classic House Pass Remix) Donae'o: I (Kenny Dope Remix) Soul Element feat. Peven Everett: How Bad I Want Ya (The Muthafunkaz Mix) DJ Man-X feat. Sara Devine: All I Need Is You (Man-X's Sunset Nights Vocal) Human Life: In It Together (Director's Cut Signature Togetherness) DJN Project feat. Nina B: Tip It Up (Ralph Session Rmx) Musol v Bongoloverz v Jackson 5 v Doug Lazy: Dancin Machine Fabrizio Marra & Donald Sheffey: Keep Pushing On (Seven Hill Soul Remix) Kings Of Tomorrow: Let It Go(98 Remix) Imaani:Found My Light (The Layabouts Vocal Mix) Farley Jackmaster Funk feat. Billy Monroe: I'm A House Head (Mike Dunn Blackball Soul Mix) Listen to the KEWL Lounge 24/7 from the comfort of your Smart phone & Tablets: the KEWL Lounge's live Stream http://rock.neostreams.info:12618 Follow Dr. KEWL on Twitter : http://twitter.com/DrKEWL On Facebook? The KEWL Lounge is on Facebook! Join us there! Be sure to share this KEWL vibe with your friends. Knowledge Expands the Way we Live. Be KEWL!!! http://www.kewllounge.net

item.title: KEWL Summer Vibe 2011
item.description: The KEWL Lounge presents KEWL Summer Vibe 2011 blended by Dr. KEWL A Soulful House mix great for your Summertime get together.On the beach, in the pool, on the deck, on the tearrace,in the backyard or in the ride, these tunes will have you relaxing, relating and releasing. A KEWL Summer Vibe adds a great musical atmosphere to your gathering of kewl friends. Ear Kandi: Warm Days feat. Swindle and Natalie Maddix:Selfish Skies (Atjazz remix) Reel People Feat. Darien:Sure (The Layabouts Future Retro Vocal Mix) Black Coffee Featuring Tsepo:Never Saw You Coming (Original Mix) Miranda Nicole:Kissing You (Libation Vox) Low Deep T:Big Love (Main Mix) Aphrodisiax feat. Tiger S:Killing Time - Part 1(kings of soul vocal) Bobby & Steve pres. Wyen Solo:Smile (Bobby & Steve & Michael Primetime Vocal) Soul Element feat. Peven Everett:how bad i want ya (the muthafunkaz mix) Leroyal - Promise (To Love You Forever) (Muthafunkaz Vocal) Monique Bingham - You. Me. World (Jon Cutler's Distant Music Mix) Musol v Regroove v Marvin Gaye & Tammy Terell Chanson:If This World were Mine Pagany featuring Myles Sanko:Another Star (Pagany Suite Vocal) Black Coffee:Trip To Lyon The Pimp - Everyday (Jerk House Connection Remix) Stephanie Cooke - Thinkin I'm Beautiful (Sean McCabe Unreleased Vocal Dub) Michael Procter:Never (The Black mix) Steven Stone feat. Marc Evans:Never Give Up (Montana & Stewart Classic House Pass remix) Kenny_Bobien:About Love (Groove Assassin Original Mix) Tom Conrad feat. Dawn Tallman:So Happy (Kenny Carvajal Habitat vocal) Herb Alpert:Rotation (reelsoul re-work) Listen to the KEWL Lounge 24/7 from the comfort of your web-enabled cell phone: KEWL live Stream http://rock.neostreams.info:12618 Follow Dr. KEWL on Twitter : http://twitter.com/DrKEWL On Facebook? The KEWL Lounge is on Facebook! Join the us! Knowledge Expands the Way we Live Be KEWL!!! http://www.kewllounge.net

item.title: Feelin KEWL (this is kewl house music)
item.description: Take a listen to this mix, these tunes will have you feeling good all day long. We have Nu music from Rainy Payne,Groove Assassin,Nina Simone,Cece Peniston,Marshall Jefferson, & Roy Ayers. KEWL music that will have you feelin KEWL! item.title: Nothing's Impossible in a Brave New World
item.description: What up KEWL!! I made this mix @ the beginning of the year to keep me positive and focused on my goals. Every song mixed in is motivating and inspirational in nature.This mix definitely has something for your Mind, Body and Soul!! You maybe playing it year round. item.title: KEWL Soul
item.description: Enjoy the smooth soulful vibe as Dr. KEWL slides between your ears, and tickles your mind with the sounds of the KEWL Lounge. The KEWL Soul playlist is available in the KEWL Lounge: http://www.kewllounge.net Be sure to join the Forum ( It's FREE!) http://thekewllounge.ning.com/ Listen to the KEWL Lounge 24/7 from the comfort of your web-enabled cell phone: http://206.51.228.181:8008 Follow Dr. KEWL on Twitter: http://twitter.com/DrKEWL Check out the KEWL Lounge on Youtube: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LSU2jSQ8C7o The KEWL Lounge is on Facebook!Join the group! You can download more mixes @ The KEWL Lounge's cast in iTunes or the KEWL Lounge Remember, Knowledge Expands the Way we Live Be KEWL!!! http://www.kewllounge.net

item.title: KEWL Quickie 5
item.description: Are you ready for a quickie? Here is the 5th intallment in the series. Hopefully the music will keep you in the groove! The Ear Kandi: Set It Off (Ian Carey And Brad Holland Mix) - Dennis Christopher, World of House - Jackin Wez, Hold Your Head Up (Stonebridge Club Anthem) - Sound Conducterz Ft Merenia, I'll Be Waiting (Gray Peran Mix) - Full Intention, A New Society (Thomas Shwarz Remix) - Starchaser, Truth (I Know You Are Beautiful) (Man-X + Reel Soul's Sunset Nights Mix) - Sterling Ensemble feat. Mario Inchausti, 3 Strikes (Lounge Mix) - Stereo Mutants feat Nicole Tyler, Feeling You (Groove Assassin Remix) - Danism & Kenny Bobien, What It Feels Like It (Quentin Harris Club Mix) - Joi Cardwell, Feel Your Soul (Scope's Soultronic Remix) - S Groove, I Will Be Your Friend - Sade
item.dc:creator: Doctor KEWL
item.itunes:summary:
Are you ready for a quickie? Here is the 5th intallment in the series. Hopefully the music will keep you in the groove!
The Ear Kandi: Set It Off (Ian Carey And Brad Holland Mix) - Dennis Christopher, World of House - Jackin Wez, Hold Your Head Up (Stonebridge Club Anthem) - Sound Conducterz Ft Merenia, I'll Be Waiting (Gray Peran Mix) - Full Intention, A New Society (Thomas Shwarz Remix) - Starchaser, Truth (I Know You Are Beautiful) (Man-X + Reel Soul's Sunset Nights Mix) - Sterling Ensemble feat. Mario Inchausti, 3 Strikes (Lounge Mix) - Stereo Mutants feat Nicole Tyler, Feeling You (Groove Assassin Remix) - Danism & Kenny Bobien, What It Feels Like It (Quentin Harris Club Mix) - Joi Cardwell, Feel Your Soul (Scope's Soultronic Remix) - S Groove, I Will Be Your Friend - Sade

item.title: KEWL Quickie # 4
item.description: Are you ready for a quickie? Well here is the 4rd intallment in the series. This quickie features tunes that I found interesting during the last three months. Hopefully the music will keep you in the groove! Got a classic Viola Wills(RIP) tune for you,her vocals will be surely missed. The Ear Kandi: Dusk Til Dawn (Carl Hanaghan Remix) - Danny Howells And Dick Trevor, This Is House (Dave Mayer & Jordy Field Vocal Remix) - John 'Julius' Knight & Roland Clark, Anticipation (Original mix) - Barbara Tucker and David Vendetta, Mo Butter (Darkroom mix) - Jamie Lewis feat. Kim Cooper, Release Yourself (Word Of Mouth Remix) - King DK, I Feel Good (Piano Mix) - Jason Herd Feat. Roland Clark, Enjoy Yourself (7th Heaven Club Mix) - Viola Wills, I Want U 2 Move (SA Dark Night Mix) - Studio Apartment feat. Mr. V, House Music (Prok & Fitch mix) - JP Chronic ft Darren J Bell, Reap (Ralf Gum Original mix) - Inaya Day and Ralf Gum, Movin' On (Joey Negro's City Vocal mix) - Prospect Park feat Carolyn Harding, Soul Glow - Martinez Be sure to join the KEWL Lounge and invite youir friends to listen in. http://www.kewllounge.net Be KEWL!!!
item.dc:creator: Doctor KEWL
item.itunes:summary:
Are you ready for a quickie? Well here is the 4rd intallment in the series. This quickie features tunes that I found interesting during the last three months. Hopefully the music will keep you in the groove! Got a classic Viola Wills(RIP) tune for you,her vocals will be surely missed.
The Ear Kandi: Dusk Til Dawn (Carl Hanaghan Remix) - Danny Howells And Dick Trevor, This Is House (Dave Mayer & Jordy Field Vocal Remix) - John 'Julius' Knight & Roland Clark, Anticipation (Original mix) - Barbara Tucker and David Vendetta, Mo Butter (Darkroom mix) - Jamie Lewis feat. Kim Cooper, Release Yourself (Word Of Mouth Remix) - King DK, I Feel Good (Piano Mix) - Jason Herd Feat. Roland Clark, Enjoy Yourself (7th Heaven Club Mix) - Viola Wills, I Want U 2 Move (SA Dark Night Mix) - Studio Apartment feat. Mr. V, House Music (Prok & Fitch mix) - JP Chronic ft Darren J Bell, Reap (Ralf Gum Original mix) - Inaya Day and Ralf Gum, Movin' On (Joey Negro's City Vocal mix) - Prospect Park feat Carolyn Harding, Soul Glow - Martinez
Be sure to join the KEWL Lounge and invite youir friends to listen in. http://www.kewllounge.net
Be KEWL!!!
